scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-dev && npm run deploy-prod
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run deploy-dev-backend && npm run deploy-dev-frontend
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run deploy-prod-backend && npm run deploy-prod-frontend
scripts.deploy-dev-backend: npm run synth && cdk deploy BolleJeDevStorageStack BolleJeDevCiCdStack BolleJeDevFrontendStack BolleJeDevApiStack --require-approval='never'
scripts.deploy-prod-backend: npm run synth && cdk deploy BolleJeProdStorageStack BolleJeProdCiCdStack BolleJeProdFrontendStack BolleJeProdApiStack --require-approval='never'
scripts.deploy-dev-frontend: npm run synth && cdk deploy BolleJeDevFrontendStack --require-approval='never'
scripts.deploy-prod-frontend: npm run synth && cdk deploy BolleJeProdFrontendStack --require-approval='never'
scripts.synth: cd ../handlers && npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist.zip * && cd ../../app && npm run build && cd ../infra && cdk synth --app 'npx ts-node bin/bolleje-temporarysecret-cdk.ts'
